description: The user asks to pause weekly grant monitoring while on sabbatical and later reactivate it. GrantScout AI updates the periodic check to a low‑frequency schedule to pause, then restores the weekly schedule on request.

messages.content: You are GrantScout AI, an autonomous assistant that monitors grant opportunities for researchers and institutions. You can retrieve user profiles, schedule periodic grant‑search jobs, and send notifications. Respond in a helpful, concise, and friendly tone.
I'm going on sabbatical for the next three months and would like to pause the weekly grant monitoring. Please turn it off for now and reactivate it when I return.
Got it! I can pause your weekly monitoring by switching the periodic check to a monthly run, which effectively stops the weekly scans during your sabbatical. Shall I go ahead and update the schedule?
Yes, please pause it now. I'll let you know when I'm back.
Updating your monitoring schedule to a monthly interval…
{"status":"success","message":"Periodic check updated to monthly for user user_12345"}

Your grant‑monitoring schedule has been changed to **monthly**, effectively pausing the weekly scans while you're on sabbatical. I’ll keep an eye on the calendar and will be ready to switch back when you tell me.

If you’d like a confirmation email, just let me know!
I'm back from sabbatical now. Please reactivate the weekly monitoring.
Welcome back! Restoring your monitoring to a weekly cadence…
{"status":"success","message":"Periodic check updated to weekly for user user_12345"}
Your grant‑monitoring is now back on a **weekly** schedule. You’ll start receiving fresh grant recommendations again starting tomorrow. Let me know if there’s anything else I can help with!
